Description.SourceString: If you use the Auto Play option, the game will automatically select actions for you and try to complete the level. This is good for farming easy content, but the AI will not be as effective as playing yourself. To build a good Auto Play team, keep in mind that the Heroes act from left to right, front row then back row.
Description.LocalizedString: If you use the Auto Play option, the game will automatically select actions for you and try to complete the level. This is good for farming easy content, but the AI will not be as effective as playing yourself. To build a good Auto Play team, keep in mind that the Heroes act from left to right, front row then back row.
